alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 16 at 1:04PM CST until November 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 degrees are expected. * WHERE...Central Brewster County, and Chisos Basin. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
